slices.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ======================
00002 !
00003 !   SLICES
00004 !
00005 !   Write out field data for 
00006 !   1D postprocessing
00007 
00008 !
00009 !
00010 ! ======================
00011 
00012 subroutine slices(timestamp)
00013 
00014 
00015   use treevars
00016   implicit none   
00017 
00018   real, dimension(ngx) :: work1, work2
00019   real, dimension(ngx) :: phi_pond, ex_pond, ey_pond, ez_pond
00020   real :: dx, dz, dy, xd, yd, zd, dummy, simtime, epondx, epondy, epondz, phipond, epond_max, box_max
00021   real :: Qtot, Qbox
00022 
00023   character(30) :: cfile
00024   character(5) :: cme
00025   character(6) :: cdump, cvis
00026   integer, intent(in) :: timestamp
00027   integer :: i, j, k, ioffset, idummy=0, ilev, ixd, iyd, izd, npx, npz, npy
00028   integer :: icall, lcount
00029   integer :: jfoc, kfoc
00030 
00031   icall = timestamp/ivis
00032   simtime = timestamp*dt
00033 
00034   ! get filename suffix from dump counter
00035   do i=0,4
00036      cdump(6-i:6-i) =  achar(mod(timestamp/10**i,10) + 48)  
00037   end do
00038   cdump(1:1) = achar(timestamp/10**5 + 48)
00039 
00040   if (me==0) then
00041      !  Fields: electron and ion densities within xl*yl*zl
00042      cfile = "wf_field."//cdump
00043      open (62,file=cfile)
00044 
00045      dx = xl/ngx
00046      dy = yl/ngy
00047      dz = zl/ngz
00048      Qbox = 0.
00049      do k=1,ngz
00050         do j=1,ngy
00051            do i=1,ngx
00052               Qbox = Qbox + rhoe(i,j,k)*dx*dy*dz
00053               write(62,'(3f13.5,2e13.3)') i*dx,j*dy,k*dz,abs(rhoe(i,j,k)),rhoi(i,j,k)
00054            end do
00055         end do
00056      end do
00057      Qtot = SUM(rhoe)*dx*dy*dz  ! including ghost cells
00058      if (debug_level>1) write(ipefile,'(4(a,f14.5/))') &
00059           'Total charge on grid:',Qbox, &
00060           '         ghost cells:',Qtot-Qbox, &
00061           '                 sum:',Qtot, &
00062           'Initial charge Q_s*Ne = rho0*V = ',Vplas*rho0
00063 
00064      close(62)
00065 
00066 
00067      cfile = "field_slice."//cdump
00068      open (62,file=cfile)
00069 
00070      jfoc = focus(2)/dy
00071      kfoc = focus(3)/dz
00072 
00073      ! density average line-out along laser axis: 5x5 average, converted to n/nc
00074 
00075      work1 = 0.
00076      work2 = 0.
00077      do k=kfoc-2,kfoc+2
00078         do j=jfoc-2,jfoc+2
00079            work1(1:ngx) = work1(1:ngx)+rhoi(1:ngx,j,k)/25./omega**2  ! density slice along laser axis: 5x5 average
00080            work2(1:ngx) = work2(1:ngx)+rhoe(1:ngx,j,k)/25./omega**2
00081         end do
00082      end do
00083 
00084      do i=1,ngx
00085         xd=i*dx-focus(1)
00086         yd=sigma/2.
00087         zd=sigma/2.
00088         laser_model: select case(beam_config)
00089 
00090         case(4)  ! standing wave fpond
00091            call fpond(1.57/omega,1.0,sigma,vosc,omega,xd,yd,zd,ex_pond(i),ey_pond(i), &
00092                 ez_pond(i), phi_pond(i))
00093         case(5)  ! propagating fpond
00094            call laser_bullet( 1., xl/2., tpulse,sigma,vosc,omega, & 
00095                 xd,yd,zd,ex_pond(i),ey_pond(i),ez_pond(i),phi_pond(i))
00096         case default
00097            ex_pond(i)=0
00098            ey_pond(i)=0
00099            ez_pond(i)=0
00100            phi_pond(i)=0
00101         end select laser_model
00102 
00103      end do
00104 
00105      write(62,'(7f13.5)') (i*dx,work1(i),work2(i), &
00106           phi_pond(i),ex_pond(i), ey_pond(i), ez_pond(i),i=1,ngx)
00107      close(62)
00108 
00109   endif
00110   icall = icall + 1
00111 
00112 end subroutine slices
00113
